name: On the edge of death (BaconGremlin24)
description:
! contains flashing lights and or imagery that may be dangerous to sensitive viewers !
------
You have finally reached the boss's dungeon!

But what's this? you're on 1 hp left?

You're on the edge of death!

Will you be able to defeat the boss without getting hit once?
------
how to play:

WASD to move around.

Mouse to aim.

Left click to shoot.

Walk into the door icon to start the fight.

Walk into the credits icon [C] to see the credits screen.

------

Made in 10 days for the vimjam 2.

I did not have enough time to tweak the balance, so the game may be hard to cpmplete.
